name: Alchemist's Feast
description:
The project was a disaster

48 hours, no time to waste

Meanwhile me: wastes hours exploring the dark side of shadergraph

Please don't download

BUT

The team was full of passion and we made what can be called a masterpiece in it's own category. Please note the raven Martha - it talks.

Together with:

Wojtero

BlenderLord

Tad1

Ania

Asia

Kasia

Remnant
